summary: The django.core package supplies the foundational infrastructure for the Django framework, offering a unified exception hierarchy, pagination utilities, secure data signing mechanisms, a comprehensive set of validators, and a helper to generate the WSGI application callable. These components collectively support error handling, data integrity, input validation, and deployment of Django projects.
business_intent: Enable developers to build reliable and secure Django applications by providing core services for managing configuration and runtime errors, dividing query results into pages, protecting serialized data with signatures, validating diverse input types, and exposing the application through a standard WSGI interface.
